description: Kona Ice is a great mobile shaved ice vendor that can bring the party to you, wherever you are! The upbeat calypso music sets the fun mood, so party out while you add your own flavors to your shaved ice, using the Flavorwave! Kona Ice also gives money back to the community, supporting local schools, businesses, sports teams, and much more! So look no further for your next summer party vendor!
name: Kona Ice of West Little Rock
